title: Can Cassiopeia have a new skin please?
body: She's got soo much potential for a good skin tbh, all her skins are meh. She needs a new skin. I got totally dissapointed for not seeing a harrowing skin for her this last pbe patch note. I think riot hates cass.

replies.body:
Cass really needs a new skin, due to her design she can be flexible into a lot of really cool skins.

I'm just waiting for Surprise Party Cassiopeia. The surprise is that she finally hit her stun.
Rework or buffs before skin , Lissandra needs one though

Her last skin came out February 2013 iirc, that was over 2 1/2 years ago. Meanwhile popular champions like Ahri receive skins on an annual basis, it's making me sick just to think about the bias which is influencing these skin releases. The likelihood of Cass receiving a new skin is probably as big as Urgot getting one, judging by both their lack of popularity and viability.
